vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.2; also called Raamiah at Neh.7.7;
Also named: ra.am.yah (רַעַמְיָה "Raamiah" H7485)
§ Reelaiah = "bearer of Jehovah"
1) one who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
1a) also 'Raamiah'
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利來雅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華的擁護者"
1) 一個隨所羅巴伯回歸的人 #拉 2:2|
1a) 亦稱 '拉米'(Raamiah [7485])
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
利来雅 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华的拥护者"
1) 一个随所罗巴伯回归的人 #拉 2:2|
1a) 亦称 '拉米'(Raamiah [7485])
